name: @inops/web-sdk
description: Inops Web SDK - zero-dependency browser bundle to embed AI Search in any shop.
author: Reef Digital

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format esm,iife --global-name Inops --minify --sourcemap --dts --out-dir dist && node scripts/rename-iife.js
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts --format iife --global-name Inops --watch --sourcemap --out-dir dist && node scripts/rename-iife.js
